alert.note: Alert for Gogebic (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 11:35AM EDT until April 19 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: .Unseasonably warm temperatures has lead to rapid snowmelt, causing flooding, particularly along the Montreal River. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of western Upper Michigan, including the following county, Gogebic. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1030 AM CDT, the public reported flooding in the warned area due to snowmelt. Flooding is already occurring. - Additional rainfall/liquid equivalent amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area this weekend. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ironwood and Ironwood Airport. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
